pages.text: To forge the ultimate blade, you must perform a drop-sacrifice. Throw the following items together on the $(n)ground$():$(br2)* $(5)Soul Anchor$()$(br)* $(7)Sentient Sword$()$(br)* $(4)Bleeding Dragon's Eye$()
Once the items touch, the essence will merge, consuming the components to birth the $(4)Blood Bound Executioner$().
